attributes.action: PM and Foreign Secretary to make a statement reinstating the UK Parliament's Supremacy.
attributes.additional_details: The Prime minister and Foreign Secretary shoulmake a statement reinstating the UK Parliament's Supremacy over the European Union and its Instititions This statement should also say any powers the EU has or are given are leased and can be withdrawn without the need for consultation/permission of the EU. This will reinforce the UK constitution of UK Parliamentry supremacy whilst still allowing us to be part of the EU at the moment.
